DOC.detailed_description: For study , investigator want treat adolescent concurrent disorder . Eligible subject invite participate combine intervention describe detail . In order determine eligibility , designate research staff conduct phone screen interview interested youth ( age 14 - 18 ) . Candidates asked question current mental health substance use status . Based information obtain interview , youth report co-occurring mental health substance use problem ask complete three internet-based self-report questionnaire use designated link unique identification number . Once information assessment collect score research personnel , candidate meet criterion study ask participate remain portion study . These subject require meet research assistant person complete computer-based self-administered structure diagnostic interview self-report questionnaire . If eligible interested , subject ask meet therapist one individual session MI . These session assess subject ' readiness engage treatment , help identify treatment goal barrier may make treatment difficult . After session , subject invite attend DBT-focused orientation prior join 12-week skill group . The investigator expect approximately 8 youth group session run 2 hour , weekly . The purpose group session learn skill help subject cope healthy way . The following skill teach : ( 1 ) interpersonal effectiveness ; ( 2 ) emotion regulation ; ( 3 ) distress tolerance : ( 4 ) mindfulness . The use skill gear address substance use problem mental health issue ( e.g . anxiety , depression , self-harm , etc. ) . Participants ask complete questionnaire follow time-points : screening , baseline , post-MI ( 2 week ) , mid-DBT ( 8 week ) , post-DBT ( 14 week ) , 14 week follow-up . Participants offer financial compensation upon completion assessment package .
